name: Absol G LV.X
author: Yusuke Ishikawa

poke_power.name: Darkness Send
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Absol G LV.X from your hand onto your Active Absol G, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, put the top card from your opponent’s deck in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Darkness Slugger
attacks.effect: You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Absol G. Absol G LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
